UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Matching amino acids membrane preference profile to improve activity of antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Kim S, Lee J, Lee S, Kim H, Sim JY, Pak B, Kim K, Il Kim J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2180(MIC=20µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=1.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCCM 40510(MIC=10µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51575(MIC=2.5µM)
